title: How to write an argumentative essay on a social problem - Quora

response.answer_text: First, state the social problem you are writing about. An example of a social problem is whether we should give alms to the beggar or not. Then you state your stand on the matter and list the reasons behind your stand. Citing authoritative persons and sources which bolster your arguments tremendously reinforces your position and this method also appllies when refuting the other side’s position. Enumerating your reasons point by point vis-a-vis the arguments presented by the other side is also the proper way of presenting your views. Finally, you make a brief recapitulation of your position on the social problem and a summary of your reasons behind your stand.
